name: Baby (Lba-Universe)
description:
Trailer here

Github

Many years ago,in a far away planet named Krypton, humans had no need to grow up and were not aged through the years. In the magical infant kingdom of paradise,they were living peacefully in harmony with their families.

One day an ancient,evil entity arrives to their planet. The king of Dragons. He decided he wants their world, but even more, he wants their souls. The powerful dragon took control over most of the babies, only few managed to escape, waiting for a savior.

The King of babies. The Baby.

3D adventure game , Interact with the world under our realistic physics unity engine,experience some action and have fun (:

Note: might take some time for web to start the game,be patiance,its worth it (;
